attributes.action: Do not grant asylum to criminal foreigners
attributes.additional_details: No British woman should be subjected to for example sexual harassment by a convicted offender because to deport him back to his home country may breach his human tights if he offended in his home country. British taxpayers should not be supporting such people.
attributes.background: I want Government or Parliament to put the human rights of British Citizens above human rights of foreign nationals that have been  convicted of criminal offences.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Deport all asylum seekers found guilty of a criminal offence in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/656477
